Dear ${object.student_id.name},
We would like to draw your attention to the present situation of your behavior/appearance mark, which stands currently at ${object.student_discipline_id.discipline_point} points.
Attitude and adhering to established and agreed standards are a central and important part of any future leader.
I would like to encourage you to take the necessary steps in adjusting your attitude and/or follow the Academy’s policies and standards of excellence in order not to jeopardize your study at the Academy.
A Student will be suspended from the semester should the behavior/appearance mark fall below the 5.5 points. The Semester will be invalidated and the tuition fee forfeited!
Good luck in your continues studies and should you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact the Student Affair officer or Registrar.
Sincerely Yours,
Markus Kalberer Dean

record.field: Disciplinary suspension from the current Semester

table.style: padding-top: 16px; background-color: #F1F1F1; font-family:Verdana, Arial,sans-serif; color: #454748; width: 100%; border-collapse:separate;

td.div:
Dear ${object.student_id.name},
Attitude, behavior and attendance are attributes which the hospitality industry is looking for.
Despite of having received two previous warning letters you continued to lose disciplinary points and your disciplinary mark has now fallen below 5.5. According to the Academy’s “Standards of Excellence” you are here with suspended from the present semester.
You have the right to appeal this decision and must do so, in writing, within 48 hours (2 working days) of the date of this letter.
The letter should be addressed to the Dean, clearly stating why you feel that you should be allowed to remain at the Academy and detailing any mitigating circumstances that contributed towards excessive disciplinary points.
Should we not receive an appeal letter within the time mentioned above, we will not be able to consider your particular circumstances. Consequently, in line with the Standard of Excellence you will be asked to leave the school and the semester will be marked as failed.
The academics office is open from 9.00 am until 5.00 pm Monday to Friday.
Please be informed that you are not eligible for any refund of the tuition fee!
Sincerely Yours,
Markus Kalberer Dean

If you have any problems in terms of health or other matters, which could continue to affect you in the future, please feel free to contact the Operation Manager or myself.
Good luck in your studies and should you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.
Sincerely Yours,
Markus Kalberer Dean
